text: Question 13 Consider the following statements S1 and S2 about the relational data model: S1: Arelation scheme can have at most one foreign key. S2: A foreign key in a relation scheme R cannot be used to refer to tuples of R. Which one of the following choices is correct? e Both S1 and S2 are true @ S1istrue and S2 is false G S1is false and S2 is true @ Both S1 and S2 are false GATE CSE 2021 SET-2 Relational Schema
